description: Update an existing KeepTruckin user assignment.
permissions: Authenticated admin users or members of the broker organization for the KeepTruckin user.
side_effects: Updates the KeepTruckin user's linked user assignment.
validation_notes: Authentication is required. The keep-truckin user ID argument is required. At least one field to update is required. --user may be set to an empty string to clear the linked user.

flags.name: --user
flags.description: User ID to link (use empty string to clear)
